short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the distracting Shorts from your YouTube feed - Declutter Your Mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Shorts are removed from your YouTube feeds seamlessly, while the Shorts tab remains accessible in the YouTube menu.

Are you fed up with mindlessly clicking on an interesting-looking short video, and 10 minutes later finding yourself still scrolling on? If so, we are with you â€“ Simply install the extension and watch as the Shorts in your feed disappear and remain disabled.

Our mission is to help you break free from doomscrolling and unclutter your mind. Not only do we block YouTube Shorts from your feeds and search results, but we also remove distracting third-party ads and promotional banners, keeping your home feed clean and focused.

With YouTube Shorts, third-party ads, and promotional banners automatically blocked from your homepage feed, this makes it easier for you to focus on meaningful content without unnecessary interruptions.

Features:
- Block YouTube Shorts: Automatically blocks all YouTube Shorts from your homepage and search feed, no toggling required.
- Remove Third-Party Ads: Eliminates ads from appearing in your YouTube feed.
- Remove Promotional Banners: Clears promotional banners from your YouTube feed.
- Disable Distractions: Keep your feed clean and focused on meaningful content.
